name: wiiuse
short_description: Wiiuse is a library written in C that connects with several Nintendo Wii wiimotes. Supports motion sensing, IR tracking, nunchuk, classic controller, and the Guitar Hero 3 controller. Single threaded and nonblocking makes a light weight and clean API.
